title: Lost Orange Essence
body:
Hi,

I filed a bug report recently about losing my orange essence after getting to the final "Accept purchase" stage of buy a ward skin then changing my mind. 
It took my essence but I got no ward :(

Any update?

Cheers!

replies.body: Heya, was it the Sad Mummy Ward?  I do see that it was created using 340 Orange Essence and should be in your inventory.  Is this still an issue?

Yea it was Sad Mummy Ward, It is not appearing in my inventory :( 

I decided I didn't want it but now I lost my essence too :( 

Screengrab
https://imgur.com/a/11bS8

Thanks!

It's already unlocked on your account, so it won't be in your hextech.  You will find it in your ward skin inventory during champion select.  If you have a refund token, we may be able to refund it through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
